io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel

Class TextChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.GuildChannel
        • io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel.TextChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, IGuildChannel, IGuildTextChannel, ITextChannel, IMentionable, ICreationTime, ISnowflake

    public class TextChannel
extends GuildChannel
implements IGuildTextChannel
    Represents a TextChannel in a Guild on Discord
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    Perry Berman
